short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your digital learning experience with ClassHive Kids. One location and one login for all your classroom resources.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the extension installed, students can login using their QR code or access code and be able to see all their apps with the handy automated logins provided by ClassHive. It offers a simple and quick solution for access to the schools digital resources for all learners.

You will need a ClassHive account and access to the student portal to be able to use this. Talk to your school and find out more at https://www.getclasshive.com/
